channel.title: Shop Help. Easy Fix but I Can Seem To Get It
channel.description: Heres What I Have In Shop.cfg [code]shop = 4 Han's Skillcape Exchange 2 2 2678 1 2681 1 2684 1 2690 1 2696 1 2699 1 2702 1 2705 1 2708 1 2714 1 2717 1 2723 1 2726 1 2729 1 2732 1 2738 1[/code] Heres What I Have In AutoSpawn.cfg [code]spawn = 544 3097 3499 0 0 0 0 0 1 Shop[/code] Heres What I Got In Client.java [code]case 544 Coords = true; Shop = 4; break;[/code] But after i compile and restart the server my client dosnt actually "freeze" but the screen stays black and i can click most of the buttons. so i thought "ok 1 of the skillcapes must not be in class8". so i tried to spawn em all with ::pickup and they all work fine. can anyone help me? Im using richscape.

item.title: Shop Help. Easy Fix but I Can Seem To Get It
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

u made sure the prices are over 9000!?

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help. Easy Fix but I Can Seem To Get It
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

Heres What I Have In Shop.cfg

shop = 4	Han's Skillcape Exchange			2	2	2678	1	2681	1	2684	1	2690	1	2696	1	2699	1	2702	1	2705	1	2708	1	2714	1	2717	1	2723	1	2726	1	2729	1	2732	1	2738	1

Heres What I Have In AutoSpawn.cfg

spawn = 544	3097	3499	0	0	0	0	0	1	Shop

Heres What I Got In Client.java

case 544 Coords = true; Shop = 4; break;
But after i compile and restart the server my client dosnt actually “freeze” but the screen stays black and i can click most of the buttons. so i thought “ok 1 of the skillcapes must not be in class8”. so i tried to spawn em all with ::pickup and they all work fine. can anyone help me? Im using richscape.

Read full topic
